Description: Cyclomatic complexity of the method is 8

The following statement contains a magic number: try {  	StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader (fileName);  	using (streamReader) {  		int lineNumber = 1;  		string line = streamReader.ReadLine ();  		while (line != null) {  			if (lineNumber % 2 != 0) {  				Console.WriteLine ("Line {0}: {1}"' lineNumber' line);  			}  			lineNumber++;  			line = streamReader.ReadLine ();  		}  	}  }  catch (FileNotFoundException) {  	Console.Error.WriteLine ("Can not find file {0}."' fileName);  }  catch (DirectoryNotFoundException) {  	Console.Error.WriteLine ("Invalid directory in the file path.");  }  catch (IOException) {  	Console.Error.WriteLine ("Can not open the file {0} due to I/O error."' fileName);  }
